As much as I love this game, I can't recommend it. It's way too unbalanced. The devs don't know what they want, and everytime they release something new they nerf the hell out of it. The community's also WAY too toxic, people complaining about the other side's perks and such, here's an example : Killers will dodge survivors for playing the game (if they have over 100 hours, if they're wearing prestige costumes, if they use items, if they use offerings that give more bloodpoints) and survivor will DC before losing so killers don't get their exp, and that's what I mean by toxic, you're literally getting punished for playing the game.The game's also more frustrating than fun, as it heavily relies on perks so if you encounter someone with really good perks, you're guranteed to lose and that's why it's really unbalanced.

However, if you'll willing to overlook those things  I'd recommend getting it, it's competitive and well not fun but nice.
I don't regret my purchase myself, but the game's currently way too unbalanced and it feels as though the devs rely on their community for changes rather than relying on what they what, and that's one of the reasons it's really unbalanced.  One of the sides whine? "Oh no, it's unfair for them!", they're getting a huge buff. The  devs are also really trying to balance the game around low ranks but it's not a good idea since it makes it really easy for higher rank players.

Don't get me wrong, it's a good game but in its current state I cannot recommend it. Maybe on sale for its 10$ but other than that, nope.

If your curious about the gameplay :

As a survivor, you get sent into a trial with 3 other strangers/friends. Your objective is to repair generators and open the door and escape. There are a few obstacles that "protect" you against the killer, them being pallets and windows. Be careful though, you can still get hit when going through windows. Pallets however, can stun the killer. But they're pretty broken at the moment, since they can teleport you to the killer's side giving him a free hit. Also, if you'rre the last one alive and there are atleast 2 generators done, a hatch will open for you  and you can escape through it. There's also a way of escaping through the hatch with others, for that you'll need a skeleton key or a dull key. For all 4 people to escape using the hatch, you need all 5 gens done. for 3 people to escape through the hatch (1 dead) you need 4 gens done. For 2 people escaping through the hatch (2 dead) you need 3 gens done.

As for killer, you get to choose between a variety of killers : "Michael myers (aka the shape) leatherface (aka the canibal), freddy (the nightmare), doctor, hag, huntress, wraith,hillbilly, trapper,nurse. However, you need to pay inorder to play as half of them (doctor, hag, freddy, leatherface and michale myers). As one of them, your objective is to hit someone once or twice to get them downed, and bring them to a hook. That's not the only way of killing though, if you use a "mori" offering, you can use the killer's unique killing animation on a survivor after hooking them once. Every killer got only 1 unique animation though.

That about covers it all up :D

5 сломанных пробелов из 5!
Достоинства:
+Токсичное комьюнити
+Свои правила игры у сурвов
+Можно снять товарища под киллера два раза подряд и так фармить очки.
+Пати в четыре фонаря.
+Целых два чувака с бензопилами: один бьет с разбега сверху вниз, другой (платный) бьет слева направо(!)
+Можно кемпить хоть весь матч
+Степашка даже пару раз приснилась.
+Врасенька (С) iReyn
+Пак с шмотками и не один за ваши деньги
Недостатки:
-Нет голосового чата прямо в игре, чтобы можно было дисморалить прямо там.
-Нет престижа с обмазыванием каловыми массами
-Игра может загрузиться 1х1 с киллером
-Нужно больше шмоток на киллеров: фирменные пилы, топоры, маски, тотемы и прочее.
-Нет киллера Робота-убийцы с циркуляркой, всегда такого хотел.
-Можно застрять в палете, или палет спавнится вертикально и блочит проход.
-Особо одаренные выживальщики не в состояниии уйти с карты более 10 минут после открытия ворот: ни в люк ни в ворота. 
-Прити гуд джоб соу фар!

Dead by Daylight is a competative online multiplayer game-- the unique scenario: a slasher/horror-type plot where you can play as either the survivors or the killer.

The developers are very proactive with updates, responding to both balancing issues and bug fixes. Games like this tend to lack [re]playability (as there are no variation in game modes), however the competative nature of this game creates and the large playerbase allows for plenty of variation for more than a few hours of entertainment. 

The real fun in this game is the suspense (as with a slasher/horror flick), which is largely reliant on how willing the killer is in indulging the survivors in a game of cat and mouse.

Outside of the playing cometitively online, there is also the option to play  with your friends in closed matches (which can also be very fun).

Игра откровенно кал на момент написания обзора:
1) Баланс в рейтинге нулевой, ты можешь играть на низком ранге (пепел) и тебе будет закидывать противников высшего ранга (радужный).
2) Задания\Квесты нужно по кд выбирать, почему нельзя сделать их всегда активными, для чего я должен постоянно выбирать ветку сурва, ветку маньяка, менять гребаное задание и помнить про него при каждом переключении или выполнении.
3) Античита нет, просто загрузочная обложка античита.
4) Ретинговая система кал, помимо радужных противников за тебя играют тиммейты дауны так же которые могут быть люого ранга как радужного так и пепла
Баланс все еще гавно.

Когда сделали что во время удачного побега пропадают улучшения со шмотки и когда она сломанная востанавливалась после побега - это стало неплохим звоночком для ухода, в совокупности со всем этим мусором считаю, что не играбельно, только в стаке из 5 друзей

нечего

Probably the most amazing game I've played, 500 hours as of this post and definitely worth the money. Unless you really dislike 'mindless killing games' then this is the game for you.

First off we have AMAZING ping, I'm talking getting hit a whole second after you vault a window, just like in real life.

Secondly we have, ofcourse, INCREDIBLE bugs that are absoloutely game-breaking coming with every single update/patch, especially when it comes with new content. My personal favourite, which I believe may be still in the game as of the time of this post, is flying survivors.. [i] Goodbye Adam, enjoy your time in the skies my friend.. [/i]

Thirdly, we have the most realistic and amazing reach, like when you're a whole meter away from the killers mallet and it still hits you, really immersive and I just, I really love how realistic the physics in the game are.

Lastly we have PERFECT matchmaking, you will always be matched with that 300+ ping on Sunday afternoon, and, ofcourse, it can't be perfect if it doesn't match you with people of the complete opposite rank every few matches!

And, as the game devs always say: [b] I think we did a pretty good job so far :) [/b]

In all seriousness, the game, besides the few bugs, funny or frustrating, the game is actually amazing and has the most entertaining gameplay. The devs do seem to care about the game. Everything they've done is just bloody wonderful, the lore, the mechanics, the gameplay, the fun bugs, the killers, the survivors, the maps, etc..

Buy the game, it's definitely worth the money, every last penny of it.

Thank you for reading and,

I hope you see you in the fog.

Spiele Dbd nun seit knapp 3 Monaten und finde es durchweg positiv. Hauptsächlich spiele ich als Überlebender, habe aber auch schon ein paar mal als Killer probiert. Es entstehen spannende Runden, man muss sich konzentrieren z.b beim Reparieren eines Generators; man schafft es in letzter Sekunde durchs Tor; man muss noch einen Kameraden befreien obwohl man fliehen könnte; man steckt irgendwo fest und muss zum Tor schleichen; sich in letzter Sekunde verstecken... etc etc. Der Soundtrack passt perfekt, er ist auf die Situationen im Spiel ausgelegt. Schleicht man, rettet man einen Mitspieler oder geht man in den Keller etc. ändert sich der Soundtrack. Das macht einen großen Teil der Atmosphäre aus. Die Maps sind gut gestaltet. Man hat viele Versteckmöglichkeiten, Gebäude mit besonderen Generatoren. Sehr gerne spiele ich beim Mac Millan Anwesen oder auch in Lerrys Gedenkinstitut. Es gibt viele verschiedene Killer und Survivor, so ist es immer abwechslungsreich. Jeder Charakter hat eine eigene Geschichte. Freddy als Killer finde ich sehr gut gelungen, ebenso den Fallensteller, die Jägerin, Die Krankenschwester... Problem an diesem Spiel sind oft die Spieler selbst... es wird gecampt oder andere Mitspieler offensichtlich verraten oder später in der Lobby beleidigt, weil etwas nicht geklappt hat. Der Einstieg wird einem nicht leicht gemacht. Am Anfang explodieren eben noch mehr Generatoren, da man sich erst an die Funktionsweise der Fähigkeitschecks gewöhnen muss. Bis ich das wirklich gut konnte sind schonmal 40 Std Spielzeit drauf gewesen. Man muss erst rausfinden wie man am besten vom Killer flieht oder wo man sich versteckt. Wann man Generatoren repariert oder wann man lieber wartet... Danach kann man aber auch gut zum Spielwesen beitragen und es macht auch mehr Spaß. Klare Empfehlung, probiert es einfach aus.

愚蠢且毫无意义的改动
陷阱杀手的加强毫无道理,强度远远超过其他屠夫并且超过人类可以应付的程度.
这次的改动与人屠平衡性毫无关系,夹子的加强对于人类玩家和非夹子的屠夫极不公平.夹子从来不是拉低屠夫胜率的屠夫,提高屠夫胜率也不应该通过对一个屠夫的大幅加强来实现.大幅加强的道具只有夹子可以使用,这是极不合理的,这不能给玩家一个平衡的游戏环境,只能强迫人类玩家放弃这款游戏,屠夫玩家被迫选择玩陷阱杀手.这是不应该发生的事情!!!
取消这次愚蠢且毫无意义的改动.

[h1]UPDATED 2020[/h1]

Still biased against killers cuz of course Survive With Friends players will be talking on discord or whatever, which is basically cheating.

[h1]ORIG REVIEW[/h1]
Short review: the game has issues, but it's fun and I have no problem recommending it! :)

Which is actually saying a lot, coming from a person who is 1) very anti-MP-only games -- especially asymmetrical MP-only games -- and 2) up until getting hooked on this game (no pun intended :P) would have laughed at the suggestion of playing a game "like a 3rd person shooter but u have no gun" ;P and of course 3) has relatively demanding standards in general.

Actually, the first free weekend, I played very little, and didn't intend to take the game seriously. (Mainly for reasons above.) But the second free weekend, even though I approached it at first like "well I'll just pop in and chop up a few survivors and get on with my life", I wound up putting more time in, on both survivors and killer sides, and pretty quickly found myself convinced to buy.

If you're interested, try and get in and just [i]have[/i] that fun, and don't sweat the issues. As soon as you start going forums, things go downhill. As soon as you start caring about your rank, things go downhill. (Not fast, but downhill. Fast later tho. ;P)

Again, many of the complaints about this game [i]are[/i] legitimate (YMMV, and please, when you are reading comments in ppls' negative reviews, keep in mind that those are some of the most butthurt moments of their lives, and you should probably take it with a grain of salt), but the game is popular (critically important in an MP-only title!), and has a lot of unique and positive things going for it, too. And, devs are still active and engaged, and while they currently (2017-11) seem to be in a bit of a situation with growing complaints about certain balance issues in the game, I believe they will continue to put good effort in, and fix those issues, and others! gg!

FWIW I play both killer and survivor and I wouldn't say I have a "main" preference. Both have their "issues", as well as their fun moments!

[h1]非常耐玩的一款恐怖游戏[/h1]！
在游戏里当逃生者时每一个独具特色的杀手都能让你感受到不程度的紧张感，而作为杀手的时候也能体验到追捕猎物和折磨猎物（虐待狂？？？？）的真实体验。游戏的背景音乐做得很好，特别是作为逃生者时的背景音乐，能够很成功的渲染气氛，让你感受到被人追杀的紧张心情。说真的玩了两百多个小时，虽说已经习惯了各种杀手和懂了很多套路，可是被追杀的时候难免还是会很紧张，这就是这款游戏的魅力吧！
再说说游戏的制作组，对中国的玩家非常的友好和照顾！不但新年版本加入有中国特色的道具鞭炮，为逃生者角色加入了鸡年新衣，而且还尊重中国玩家的票选结果，出了杨永信屠夫（手动滑稽）以及和他对应的逃生者角色网瘾少女玖妹，也很关照的开了steam中文社区，以及微博账号，微信公众号和贴吧账号 方便玩家获取游戏资讯。试问有哪几个制作组能做到如此关照中国玩家！

nice

虽然我只有短短的26小时游戏时间，但我对这款游戏的喜欢从发售就开始了。一直没很多时间玩，制作商一直在考虑用户的意见，就这点你不给好评？你是人？
     作为一个萌新经历了一次又一次的秒挂树和鞭尸后，我还是爱着这个游戏。
     只不过，有一次，我和朋友排的时候排半天都排不到人，这让我很失望。也许一个游戏总有终结吧。
     反观这个游戏，有些人喜欢玩屠夫鞭尸，有些人喜欢玩医生电人，有些人喜欢拿光剑砍人，有些人喜欢溜屠夫。这里难道不是你变态欲望的终点吗？
     这个游戏，我是想给它很多奖项的，去年到今天仍然在出DLC。十分有心。一直在给游戏续命。你不赞？
     相对有些制作商来说，良心多了好吗
Достаточкно интересна игра , но вот из за оптимизация много в неё не поиграешь да и временами она сильно наскучивает
